channel.title: Go Humble! RSS BOOKS
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle books bundles!

item.title: Forgotten Realms Vault by Wizards of the Coast
item.content:encoded: If you’re a Dungeons and Dragons fan, you’ve likely heard of the Forgotten Realms, fantastical lands of magical creatures and powerful deities that exist in the shadows of our world. But have you ever traveled out into these dangerous places hoping to unearth their secrets, and perhaps have an adventure or two? Now you can, thanks to our newest bundle of 40 fantasy ebooks that comes courtesy of none other than Wizards of the Coast! Here you’ll find thrilling tales of devils, dark elves, mercenaries, and mages from all your favorite authors, including Erin M. Evans, Richard Lee Byers, and Forgotten Realms’ creator Ed Greenwood himself. Spend all the coin you wish and dive right into one of fantasy literature’s most exciting worlds, and help support the education of children in need with First Book!

item.title: Charlie Jane Anders & Annalee Newitz by TOR
item.description: Speculative fiction like you’ve never seen before
item.content:encoded: You’ve never read sci-fi quite like this. We’ve joined forces with TOR for our latest ebook bundle, which features no less than 21 fantastic ebooks and digital shorts written by acclaimed authors Charlie Jane Anders and Annalee Newitz, co-founders of io9 and co-hosts of the Hugo-winning podcast Our Opinions Are Correct. Survive the dystopian corporate controlled future of Annalee Newitz’s Autonomous! Journey to the dark side of an alien planet in Charlie Jane Anders’ The City in the Middle of the Night! Follow the exploits of a vengeful mother-daughter witch duo in Anders’ Lessons in Magic and Disaster! Explore a post-war San Francisco with the sentient food service robots of Newitz’s Automatic Noodle! If you’ve been looking for a wealth of imaginative speculative fiction to add to your library, grab this bundle while you can, and support Miss Major and Alexander L. Lee’s TGIJP Black Trans Cultural Center with your purchase!

item.title: Ultimate Solutions Architect Cloud Bundle by Packt
item.content:encoded: The cloud computing bundle you’ve been waiting for has finally arrived—pay what you want for the ultimate collection of solutions-based cloud architecture and take your knowledge to the next level. We’ve teamed up with the experts at Packt to curate a library of courses specially designed to help you master cloud architecture. Get Azure Cloud Projects, AWS for Solutions Architects 3rd Edition, Solutions Architect's Handbook 3rd Edition, and 10+ additional lessons today, and help support the Make-A-Wish Foundation when you shop with Humble!

item.title: Doctor Who Audio Adventures by Big Finish
item.description: All of time and space in your headphones
item.content:encoded: Travel through the cosmos alongside the universe’s friendliest Time Lord with this bundle of Doctor Who audiobooks from Big Finish! Featuring your favorite Doctor Who stars and full cast recordings, this bundle is a treasure trove of adventures for superfans and newbies both. Join the likes of Christopher Eccleston’s Ninth Doctor, John Hurt’s War Doctor, and Alex Kingston’s time-warped archaeologist River Song on their quests through time and space to save the universe from Time Eddies, intergalactic criminals, and those pesky Daleks. There’s so much more to explore in this audio bundle, so act now to grab it at the price of your choice, and support the BBC’s Children in Need charity with your purchase! No running required. Well—maybe a little bit of running. You never know.

item.title: High Tech Career Playbook Bundle by Manning
item.description: Big time savings on high tech teachings
item.content:encoded: Looking for a new role in tech? Take control of your career and learn the skills you need to succeed with the High Tech Career Playbook Bundle by Manning Publications. Unlock volumes 1–2 of the acclaimed Acing the CCNA series, the savvy Investing for Programmers course, the C-suite–ready Think Like a CTO lesson, and much more. Pay what you want to flip the script on your career prospects and help support Feeding America with your purchase.

item.title: Quilting and Embroidery by C & T Publishing
item.content:encoded: Looking to take up a new hobby but don’t know where to start? Already mastered the basics but need some tips to expand your skill set? If you find yourself in either situation and happen to be into quilting and embroidery, we’ve got good news: a whole bundle of 25 ebook resources from C&T Publishing that’ll help you sew the quilts of your dreams!! Learn techniques like quilt-as-you-go, sashiko stitching, turning fabric scraps into patchwork, embroidering fun doodles or pictures of your beloved pet, and more! Master the art of fabric crafts with this ebook bundle, and support One Tree Planted with your purchase at the price of your choice!

item.title: NBM Graphic Novels 50th Anniversary Collection by NBM Graphic Novels
item.description: Stories you won’t find anywhere else
item.content:encoded: Celebrate 50 years of incredible graphic novels with NBM! To mark this anniversary, we’ve partnered with the Eisner Award-winning publisher to collect 40 amazing graphic novels hailing from all over North America and Europe—and bring them straight to your inbox. Enjoy the sumptuously illustrated Fairy Tales of Oscar Wilde, dive into biographies of Rosa Parks and the Beatles, seek adventure with Hasib and the Queen of Serpents, and ride the thrills of the monster theme park at the heart of Zombillenium. If you’re a fan of graphic novels, great literature, or even just good storytelling, grab this bundle while you can and support hospitalized kids with Starlight Children's Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: CompTIA AI Certification Prep and Practice Tests by Mammoth
item.description: Don’t just learn material, master exams
item.content:encoded: Mammoth Club is here with the complete roadmap for your entire IT career. From the foundational 'Trifecta' (A+, Network+, Security+) to advanced specialized roles in Cybersecurity, Cloud, and Data, this bundle covers every inch of the industry-standard CompTIA pathway. Whether you are looking to land your first help desk job or pivot into a high-level security role, this collection gives you the resources to get certified and get hired. Fast-track your IT career and start certifying today.

item.title: Knit Happens! Knitting for Creative Knitter Critters by Abrams Books
item.content:encoded: Already got the knack for knitting but unsure where to take your skills? Ready to pick up a new hobby in the new year and already planning out ambitious projects? Look no further than this bundle of ebooks from Abrams Books full of inspiration and instructions for every creative knitting project under the sun! Here you’ll find tips and templates to turn simple knits into professional-grade garments, traditional sweater patterns with modern twists, hundreds of stitches to add to your knitting lexicon, and so much more! Get started on your knitting projects today with this ebook bundle available for the price of your choosing, and support indie bookstore and comic shop charity organization BINC with your purchase!

item.title: So You Wanna Try Out Call of Cthulhu by Chaosium
item.description: Invite eldritch terror to your table
item.content:encoded:
Bring a taste of terror to your game nights with this bundle from Chaosium, complete with everything you need to run the dreaded (yet beloved) Call of Cthulhu RPG system! On top of the Call of Cthulhu Starter Set, you’ll get the Investigator Handbook, replete with expanded rules for creating player characters, as well as the Keeper Rulebook, brimming with all the information you need to keep things orderly as your table descends into madness. You’ll also get tons of adventures, including some aimed at first-time game masters, as well as entire campaigns! Pay what you want for over 25 books and game aids for this seminal RPG and help support the World Wildlife Fund with your purchase!

Codes are redeemable through the DriveThruRPG website.

item.title: Fierce Women of Science Fiction, Fantasy & Horror by Open Road Media
item.description: Female fronted fiction for every genre fan
item.content:encoded: Male-dominated genre fiction? Not in this bundle. There are tons of talented women working within the realms of sci-fi, fantasy, and horror, and for our latest deal we’ve teamed up with Open Road Media to offer over 60 of the best, most unique, and most unforgettable books from icons of female written fiction. In this ebook collection, you’ll meet an immortal water witch who dreams of releasing the great Leviathan in Cherie Priest’s Fathom. You’ll run from zombies with intrepid news reporters in Mira Grant’s Feedback. You’ll puzzle over an elderly woman’s dual sets of memories (and children) in Jo Walton’s My Real Children. You’ll immerse yourself in stories of Caribbean folklore and fantasy in Nalo Hopkinson’s Skin Folk. There’s so much more to enjoy in this great bundle, so grab it now at the price of your choosing, and support young adult mental health charity Active Minds with your purchase!

item.title: Dynamite Character Crossover Comics by Dynamite
item.description: Killer character crossovers for the new year
item.content:encoded: We’ve assembled Dynamite Entertainment’s hottest eComics into a bundle you won’t want to miss. Vampirella, John Carter of Mars, Red Sonja, and the universe’s greatest heroes collide in an epic series of battles across DIE!NAMITE Vols. 1–6. Grab your boomstick for the action-packed mayhem of Army of Darkness: Ash vs. the Classic Monsters, Vols. 1–6. Bad guys beware—the femme fatales of Dynamite unite to stop a legendary evil in Swords of Sorrow: The Complete Saga. Pay what you want and help support the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund!
